description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. A puzzle / action game - you're a white blood cell and your host has a tumor. Navigate through increasingly treacherous areas of the body to find and wipe it out. Evade enemy viruses, trap them in the scenery, or exploit them to solve puzzles - use protein powerups to dissolve cell walls and alter your environment - conquer 40 levels in all.
description.short: A puzzle / action game - you're a white blood cell and your host has a tumor. Navigate through increasingly treacherous areas of the body to find and wipe it out. Evade enemy viruses, trap them in the scenery, or exploit them to solve puzzles - use protein powerups to dissolve cell walls and alter your environment - conquer 40 levels in all.
